Guns, Germs, and Steel; an account of the overtaking of some societies over others. 
Documenting the technology that led to the domination and subjugation seen throughout history, Jared Diamond inspects the disparate resources that existed between societal regions and climates. 
His fresh perspecitve of rational thinking is welcomed, and directly challenges old-racist ideas explaining technological differences between societies.
